column3: Wh-What's this? You're able to see me!? That's amazing, kupo!

That we should thus meet can surely be no coincidence. And so, to mark this fateful occasion, I shall make you a gift of a magical potion. “Fantasia,” it's called, and legend holds that it allows you to alter your appearance. May it serve you well, kupo!
Well now, that we should meet yet again, and just as I was given another phial of Fantasia from my minstrel friend! It's clearly fate's design that you should have it, so do take it with you, kupo!
Inventory is full. Make room in your inventory and speak with the wandering moogle once again to claim your reward.
Have you already used the Fantasia? The flavor is meant to be a little...challenging, but it's a small price to pay to become a brand-new you! Bottoms up, kupo!
